items.title: ‘Return To Silent Hill’ Is The Worst-Reviewed Video Game Movie In 19 Years
items.description: Return to Silent Hill is in theaters this weekend, arriving with the lowest Rotten Tomatoes score in nearly two decades of video game movies.
